content.text: I just dyed my hair hot pink with purple highlights.
That's cool. I've never done anything like that.
I can tell. I'm not usually one to stand out in a crowd, but I admire people who do.
Thanks. I'm actually a bit of a loner. I don't have many friends.
Oh, I'm sorry. I'm kind of the same way. I have a few close friends, but I'm not really into big social gatherings.
Me neither. I'd rather spend time alone or with a few close friends.
I like that. It's nice to have some time to yourself.
Yeah, it is. I like to read, play games, and watch movies.
Me too! I love to read, and I'm a big fan of video games.
What are some of your favorite games?
I really like the Legend of Zelda series.
Me too! I'm a big fan of the Nintendo Switch version.
Yeah, that's a great game. I also like the Mario series.
Mario is always a classic. I'm also a fan of the Pokémon games.
I've never played Pokémon, but I've heard good things about it.
It's a lot of fun. It's a role-playing game where you collect and train Pokémon to battle other trainers.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I might have to check it out.
You should! It's a great game.
